name: Genesis Simple Comments
author: Nick_theGeek

sections.description:
Genesis Simple Comments adds a new menu item to the Genesis menu allowing for easy changes to the Genesis Comments including:

  • Comment Title
  • No Comments Text
  • Comments Closed Text
  • Pings Title
  • No Pings Text
  • Avatar Size
  • Author Says Text
  • Comment Awaiting Moderation Text
  • Enable Aria Required Attribute Option
  • Display Author Field Option
  • Author Field Label
  • Display Email Field Option
  • Email Field Label
  • Display URL Field Option
  • URL Field Label
  • Replay Label
  • Notes Before Form
  • Notes After Form
  • Submit Button Label

This plugin requires the Genesis Theme Framework

Special Thanks

I owe a huge debt of gratitude to all the folks at StudioPress, their themes make my life easier.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire genesis-simple-comments folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Simple Comment menu item under Genesis
  4. Select desired comment options and save settings
sections.changelog:
1.0 (1-23-2012 : Current)

  • Added Class check to prevent errors when Genesis 1.8+ is not installed.
  • This version still requires Genesis 1.8+

1.0 (1-20-2012)

  • Added new admin builder class. This allows for a simple interface and reduced code if used with other plugins using this class.
  • Added support for Genesis 1.8

0.3 (9-15-2011)

  • Enabled translation files for localization

0.2 (9-15-2011)

  • First Public Release
